patterns: I need help picking my classes

responses: As a freshman, you should take important prerequisites such as CS 1336, CS 1136 and CS 2305
As a sophomore, you should be taking CS 2336, CS 3305, and CS 2340
As a junior, you should be taking CS 3377, CS 3354, CS 3345, and CS 3390
As a senior, you should be taking guided electives and senior design.
Oh no, we'll get back to you on that!
Oh no, we'll follow up soon to see how we can improve

patterns: I want to apply for graduation
responses: Please submit a graduation audit and we will confirm if you can graduate in the chosen semester.
